content.question: Part A The functions <math alttext="g"><mi>g</mi></math> and <math alttext="h"><mi>h</mi></math> are given by <math alttext="g open parentheses x close parentheses equals arcsin open parentheses 2 x minus 1 close parentheses"> <mi>g</mi> <mfenced> <mi>x</mi> </mfenced> <mo>=</mo> <mi>arcsin</mi> <mfenced> <mrow> <mn>2</mn> <mi>x</mi> <mo>-</mo> <mn>1</mn> </mrow> </mfenced> </math> <math alttext="h open parentheses x close parentheses equals 2 to the power of open parentheses 3 x plus 1 close parentheses end exponent"><mi>h</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>2</mn><mfenced><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfenced></msup></math>. (i) Solve <math alttext="g open parentheses x close parentheses equals pi over 6"><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>6</mn></mfrac></math> for values of <math alttext="x"><mi>x</mi></math> in the domain of <math alttext="g"><mi>g</mi></math>. (ii) Solve <math alttext="h open parentheses x close parentheses equals 7"><mi>h</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>7</mn></math> for values of <math alttext="x"><mi>x</mi></math> in the domain of <math alttext="h"><mi>h</mi></math>.

(i) Solve <math alttext="g open parentheses x close parentheses equals pi over 6"><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>6</mn></mfrac></math> for values of <math alttext="x"><mi>x</mi></math> in the domain of <math alttext="g"><mi>g</mi></math>. (ii) Solve <math alttext="h open parentheses x close parentheses equals 7"><mi>h</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>7</mn></math> for values of <math alttext="x"><mi>x</mi></math> in the domain of <math alttext="h"><mi>h</mi></math>.

topic.text: 2.13: Exponential and Logarithmic Equations and Inequalities

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Solve equations and inequalities represented analytically, with and without technology.
